statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 6 \\ 25 \\ 28 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -25 \\ -13 \\ -57 \\ -64 \\ 5 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
